SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, A.BATCH_OPERT_ID, A.EXECUT_CYCLE, C.CODE_NM EXECUT_CYCLE_NM, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND, B.BATCH_OPERT_NM, B.BATCH_PROGRM, B.PARAMTR, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM047'
AND B.BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.BATCH_PROGRM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID ASC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM047'
AND B.BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, A.BATCH_OPERT_ID, A.EXECUT_CYCLE, C.CODE_NM EXECUT_CYCLE_NM, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT, A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND, B.BATCH_OPERT_NM, B.BATCH_PROGRM, B.PARAMTR, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBATCHSCHDUL A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM047' AND A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #{batchSchdulId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBATCHSCHDUL ( BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, BATCH_OPERT_ID, EXECUT_CYCLE, EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR, EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT, EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{batchSchdulId}, #{batchOpertId}, #{executCycle}, #{executSchdulDe}, #{executSchdulHour}, #{executSchdulMnt}, #{executSchdulSecnd}, #{lastUpdusrId}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNBATCHSCHDUL SET BATCH_OPERT_ID = #{batchOpertId}, EXECUT_CYCLE = #{executCycle}, EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE = #{executSchdulDe}, EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR = #{executSchdulHour}, EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT = #{executSchdulMnt}, EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND = #{executSchdulSecnd}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE WHERE BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #{batchSchdulId}
